title: What are the activities of content marketing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Content is like the currency of the digital world, and content marketing holds the key to success in the ever-expanding online universe. Well that being said, it is a truth that content marketing is far beyond a few tips here and there. In short message, it can be said that content marketing is a strategic blend of text, visuals including images, videos, infographics and well crafted well-researched pieces of content to build trust with your audience. Here a few activities you can perform to start your content marketing efforts. Set a goal for your content marketing activitiesResearch about the target audienceBuild a blogCreate content that guides consumers through different buying cyclesThe content you create should resonate with your target audienceDo keyword research before creating your contentAdd data to your contentCreate long-form content often to give value to the readers, say 1000+ words in a postUse short and crisp headlinesBlog consistentlyRepurpose your content in the form of SlideShares, Videos and InfographicsPromote it on various social media platforms where your audience is presentFor more information about content marketing acit9ivities, visit 5 easy steps for content marketing on a small budget
